rooms.description: Large, open space with floor-to-ceiling windows at the front facade for natural light and to adhere to Vastu principles of positivity.
Spacious area serving as living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall to maximize sunlight per Vastu guidelines; also includes an adjoining kitchenette.
Multi-functional studio living area that serves as a bedroom and work area, featuring exposed concrete elements for Brutalist style.
Dedicated library space with built-in shelves and floor-to-ceiling windows on the east wall to attract wisdom and intellectual energy per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Entry door leading to the entrance hall with ample space for natural ventilation.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that ensure natural light and align with Vastu principles.
Windowed emergency exit door for safety.

notes: The design follows a Brutalist architectural style with exposed concrete and large window openings.
Floor-to-ceiling windows are included to adhere to the requested feature, ensuring ample natural light.
Vastu principles have been incorporated by orienting key spaces like the entrance hall, living area, and library appropriately.
The triplex studio design is optimized for a 60x90 feet plot with space planning in mind.
